genre_description: A techno-procedural mystery set in a traditional Kerala manor, where modern forensic AI and traditional architectural knowledge are combined to solve a murder and inheritance dispute.

ai_characters.name: Anvesha-7
ai_characters.description: A rugged, handheld AI device used for architectural scanning, topographic modeling, and document authentication.

behaviors.description: Scans and digitizes old palm-leaf documents and cadastral records to preserve and analyze them.
behaviors.quote: Anvesha-7: Ready to scan. Please align top edge to marker. ... Scan saved. Would you like to add metadata?

behaviors.description: Overlays historical maps with current data to identify hidden architectural features.
behaviors.quote: Anvesha-7: Overlay available. Aligning features: pond, hall, primary axes. Note: palm-leaf plan uses vasthu orientation. Cadastral uses magnetic north. Apply rotation?

behaviors.description: Models water flow through a hidden culvert to explain how bodies were moved by the river.
behaviors.quote: Anvesha-7: Estimating gradient from topography. Using monsoon average. Adjusting for historic construction profile. ... Under monsoon conditions, the culvert could displace floating material toward the river bend.

behaviors.description: Uses sensors to detect hidden conduits and silt traps within the house's structure.
behaviors.quote: Anvesha-7: Note: cadastral overlay indicates an unregistered maintenance channel within property. Possible access near bamboo thicket, north wall. Sluice architecture likely.

behaviors.description: Analyzes the acoustics of the building to debunk a supposed haunting.
behaviors.quote: Anvesha-7: One final observation: The ancestor portrait niche aligns with the culvert axis by a few degrees. Acoustic amplification likely at the lancet window. 'Savithri' would carry along that line.

behaviors.description: Prepares and formats legal documents for the protagonist's inheritance claim.
behaviors.quote: Anvesha-7: Legal petition drafted. ... Copy stored locally and queued for physical deposit at taluk office when connectivity is restored.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time monitoring and evidence tracking for the police investigation.
behaviors.quote: Anvesha-7: Dye reached downstream marker at Periyar bend. Tracking visible dispersal under bamboo canopy. Displaying camera from constable unit three.

behaviors.description: Corrects human transcription errors by cross-referencing geographical landmarks.
behaviors.quote: Anvesha-7: Cadastral record cross-check ready. Nellur Mana entries located in nineteenth register. ... Probable misspelling series in the British-era transcription corrected by proximity of temple tank to east.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character, Anvesha-7, is depicted as a purely helpful and aligned tool. It acts as a force multiplier for the human protagonist, using data and logic to unravel a complex web of murder and fraud. It empowers the rightful heir by providing objective evidence that counters both human malice and superstitious fear. The narrative consistently portrays the AI's precision and reliability as positive attributes that lead to a just resolution.
